body:
Hangs trying to load ssl cert list, can we just remote BIP 70 support now?

```
(gdb) thread apply all bt

Thread 2 (Thread 0x3ffff1a3ac40 (LWP 58)):
```

title: bitcoin-qt hangs on startup on Ubuntu 18.10/Debian Buster
